price: 110. Wuxuu rabaa inuu idinka saaro dhulkiinna, ee maxaad ku talineysaan?
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
